item.title: Basical Skills
item.description: Notes: Here is a link to my Github homepage Jia-Baos. C/C++ is the programming language i use most, python and shell are often used for scripting. Furthermore, cmake and mingw wil be used for Compiling across platforms. Opencv is the 3rd party Library i use most, besides, i’m also trying more 3rd party Libraries such as: Zlib, Pnglib, Blas, etc. Jia-Baos Editor-in-Chief

item.title: Biography
item.description: Notes: Here is a link to my Github homepage Jia-Baos. I am pursuing my master’s degree in Shandong University of Science and Technology. My main foucus is computer vision and their application in industry. Jia-Baos Editor-in-Chief
